text: Jess Conrad (born Gerald Arthur James; 24 February 1936) is an English actor and singer. He was born in Brixton, London. Between the late 1950s and mid-1960s, Conrad appeared in many movies such as Serious Charge (uncredited), The Boys, Rag Doll, K.I.L. 1 and Konga. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jess Conrad discography * *Official Conrad website Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:English pop singers Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Brixton Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from Brixton
title: Jess Conrad
